articles.title: Karan Johar stopped by security at Mumbai airport gate as he forgets to show ID, watch here - The Indian Express
articles.description: Karan Johar was stopped at the Mumbai airport by security personnel after he simply walked in without undergoing the ID check. He doubled back and produced the documents, although it took him a few moments to find them in his bag.
